attributes.action: An MP who leaves the party to which they were elected to trigger a bye election
attributes.additional_details: We currently are seeing a number of MP's leaving the party under which they were elected which is in my opinion undermines the electorate
attributes.background:
For too long MP'S have been allowed to basically ignore the constituents that elected them for their political views and take up an independent view by leaving such party.
My belief is that any person doing so should have to stand down and thus trigger a bye election.
